## CHAT vs AQ-20

Harmonisation is a crucial aspect of every psychologistâ€™s job, especially when dealing with different questionnaires like CHAT and AQ-20. Both instruments serve important roles in assessing autism symptoms, however, comparing them can be tedious. The Harmony software comes in handy in speeding up this process. Using this tool, psychologists can easily select these instruments from the Harmony's database or upload their own, and the Harmony tool does the rest. The era of getting lost in fastidious manual comparisons of CHAT vs AQ-20 is thus being redefined for efficiency and reliability.

## Compare the items in CHAT and AQ-20

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#___" target="harmonyapp">Import just AQ-20 into Harmony</a> - compare AQ-20 with other instruments

What makes Harmony stand out is its utilization of natural language processing and generative AI to identify harmony of questionnaire items. It delivers detailed results, including the percentage match between each item in CHAT and AQ-20. With Harmony, the intricate analysis of CHAT vs AQ-20 becomes less of a hurdle, leaving more time for service provision. This remarkable innovation does not just stop at English language, but extends its versatility across multiple languages.
